Segment.name: SL1
Segment.comment: To reference details of the tariff used to arrive at applicable rates or charges for customer-requested service

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode1
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: TariffNumber
Field.comment: Standard tariff number for the tariff which governs the rates applied to the commodity item(s)

Field.name: CommodityCode
Field.comment: Code describing a commodity or group of commodities

Field.name: Scale
Field.comment: A carrier-maintained reference used to further identify a schedule of rates within a tariff

Field.name: Date
Field.comment: Date expressed as CCYYMMDD where CC represents the first two digits of the calendar year

Field.name: ServiceLevelCode2
Field.comment: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Field.name: ShipmentMethodOfPayment
Field.comment: Code identifying payment terms for transportation charges

Field.name: InternationalDomesticCode
Field.comment: Code indicating international or domestic shipment

SyntaxNote.name: R0304
SyntaxNote.comment: At least one of SL103 or SL104 is required.
